mapper.select: SELECT m.out_code, m.out_wh_code, o.order_code, s.stock_code, e.emp_num, m.out_status, m.out_date, m.out_amount FROM out_material m LEFT JOIN warehouse w ON m.out_wh_code = w.wh_code LEFT JOIN orders o ON m.order_code = o.order_code LEFT JOIN emp e ON m.emp_num = e.emp_num LEFT JOIN stock s ON m.stock_code = s.stock_code
SELECT out_code FROM out_material WHERE out_code LIKE #{trBranchNumber} ORDER BY out_code DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM warehouse WHERE wh_code = #{wh_code} limit 1
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_code = #{order_code} limit 1
SELECT * FROM emp WHERE emp_num = #{emp_num} limit 1
SELECT s.*,p.prod_name, p.prod_taste FROM stock s LEFT JOIN product p ON s.prod_code = p.prod_code WHERE stock_code = #{stock_code} limit 1
